project_descr: The project aims to support the First  Zanzibar Vice President's Office in strengthening climate change governance for Zanzibar through capacity building and mainstreaming of adaptation actions in development plans.

outputs.output_descr: The projects aims to support the First Vice President's Office in strengthening climate change governance for Zanzibar through capacity building and mainstreaming of adaptation actions in development plans including: establishment and operationalization of institutional structure for effective climate change governance, mainstreaming climate change adaptation in implementation of development policies and plan, establishment of climate change financing mechanism, scaling up the use of low carbon and energy efficient technologies in Zanzibar.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

document_name: Signed project Revision 1 for Env and CC Governance Zanzibar
